hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Decoupling During BTC Consolidation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a low-volatility consolidation phase (20-day rolling volatility < 40% annualized) while the overall market regime is NEUTRAL, select altcoins with strong recent fundamentals (positive news flow, development activity spike) will decouple and outperform BTC by >8% over the following 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During BTC consolidation, capital rotates to narratives with fresh catalysts. Low BTC volatility reduces systemic risk, allowing idiosyncratic alpha to emerge. Recent examples: SOL ecosystem growth during Q4 2023 BTC range.
entry_conditions: Altcoin (from approved list) has: 1) Positive news sentiment score > 0.3 (7-day avg), 2) GitHub commit count > 30% above 30-day average
Altcoin/BTC pair breaks above 20-day Bollinger Band upper band on 4h timeframe
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median altcoin/BTC performance during BTC low-vol periods is ≤2% over 5 days, or no significant difference vs random periods.
